item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 15, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Milk Kanban (269 points | 115 comments)
3. Wyvern's Open Satellite Feed (36 points | discuss)

22. A Polyomino Tiling Algorithm (2018) (20 points | discuss)
23. RubyLLM: A delightful Ruby way to work with AI (579 points | 151 comments)
24. Show HN: Metacheck – preview how any link appears on social media and chat apps (119 points | 27 comments)

26. Transformers Without Normalization (224 points | 29 comments)
27. A look at Firefox forks (478 points | 322 comments)
28. Athena landed in a dark crater where the temperature was -280° F / -173° C (218 points | 242 comments)
29. Tj-actions/changed-files GitHub Action Compromised – used by over 23K repos (200 points | 250 comments)
30. Collatzeral damage: bitwise and proof foolish (9 points | 2 comments)
